/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene moment on a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the scene. The street is lined with bare trees, their branches reaching out into the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene. A white car is parked on the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the otherwise tranquil setting. In the distance, a blue sign stands out against the natural backdrop, perhaps indicating a nearby landmark or direction. The image beautifully encapsulates a typical day in Beijing, where nature and urban life coexist harmoniously.
